raw_comment:
Notice: I noticed that students with a legacy boost had the highest chance of being admitted to an elite college.
Wonder: I wonder why colleges place so much emphasis on students’ legacy and background, rather than their grades and test scores.
Headline: “Legacy or Lose”
Response: I responded saying “I really enjoyed your wonder as well as your headline, I too am wondering what other roles go into the college admissions project. It feels like so much emphasis is placed on a student’s background and their legacy or lack thereof”.
ace_sentences: I noticed a group of students.
The students had a legacy boost.
The students had the highest chance of being admitted to an elite college.
Colleges place much emphasis on a student's legacy.
Colleges place much emphasis on a student's background.
Colleges place less emphasis on a student's grades.
Colleges place less emphasis on a student's test scores.
I also wonder about other roles in the college admissions process.
It feels that colleges place much emphasis on a student's background.
It feels that colleges place much emphasis on a student's legacy.
It feels that colleges place much emphasis on a student's lack of legacy.
